# NOTE: This file is generated by yotta: changes will be overwritten!

cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 2.8.11)

include_directories("/Users/jax/Documents/Developer/SmartCar/mbed/playground/blinky/source")


set(YOTTA_AUTO_BLINKY_CPP_FILES
    "/Users/jax/Documents/Developer/SmartCar/mbed/playground/blinky/source/app.cpp"
)
# force dependency on the config header for cpp files, which CMake otherwise wouldn't track:
set_property(SOURCE ${YOTTA_AUTO_BLINKY_CPP_FILES} PROPERTY OBJECT_DEPENDS "/Users/jax/Documents/Developer/SmartCar/mbed/playground/blinky/build/redbearlab-nrf51822-gcc/yotta_config.h")
set(YOTTA_AUTO_BLINKY_HEADER_FILES
    "/Users/jax/Documents/Developer/SmartCar/mbed/playground/blinky/source/LEDService.h"
)
# force dependency on the config header for header files, which CMake otherwise wouldn't track:
set_property(SOURCE ${YOTTA_AUTO_BLINKY_HEADER_FILES} PROPERTY OBJECT_DEPENDS "/Users/jax/Documents/Developer/SmartCar/mbed/playground/blinky/build/redbearlab-nrf51822-gcc/yotta_config.h")


add_executable (blinky
    ${YOTTA_AUTO_BLINKY_CPP_FILES}
    ${YOTTA_AUTO_BLINKY_HEADER_FILES}
)
set_target_properties(blinky PROPERTIES ENABLE_EXPORTS ON)

yotta_postprocess_target(EXECUTABLE blinky)



target_link_libraries(blinky
    mbed-drivers
    ble
)
